Metadata.Title: CVE-2024-24789 affecting package msft-golang for versions less than 1.22.4-1
Metadata.Description: CVE-2024-24789 affecting package msft-golang for versions less than 1.22.4-1. This CVE either no longer is or was never applicable.

Criterion.Comment: Package msft-golang is earlier than 1.22.4-1, affected by CVE-2024-24789
